title: LFT OR DUO
body:
This account's perm banned, ex diamond 1. 
Going to play on smurf and get it atleast diamond 5 before end of season. 
Hit me up if you would like to play. I play anything.
Need to have some sort of voice communication just for fun. :D

IGN: Only Smurf AU

Good luck on the rift guys and grills!!!!

replies.body:
Hello!
I am a support main and im aiming to reach gold before the season ends. However, we might not be able to play because I'm only in Silver V, depends on what your smurf's rank is atm :)

Feel free to add me and we can play tonight to test synergy
